ygData.subject: SV: Full Report!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not that I try to discourage you, but the coin is supposed to be for the Enchanter quest for a high level spell, Tashania. The coins have only been in the
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>

---

>I found, on the ground, an item called An old silver coin. It looked like a normal
>silver coin, but it was an actual item. The strangest thing, though was that
>it was a MAGIC ITEM, a LORE ITEM, AND...NO DROP!


Not that I try to discourage you, but the coin is supposed to be for the Enchanter quest for a high level spell, Tashania.
The coins have only been in the game for about three weeks, so I doubt that they have anything to do with it.

But the Idea of searching under water sounds possible, I mean, how many people have actually been in places like Kedge Keep...

So, keep on searching.

/Tmira - Gnome Enchantress on Bristlebain
